epic.name: DAMPENER GRIP
epic.description: When you deal more damage with [Rocket Hammer], reduce the cooldown of your abilities by 1s.

epic.name: PLAN Z
epic.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed every 100 missing Life, up to 30%.

rare.name: BOOST RECYCLER
rare.description: If [Charge] is interrupted by the enemy, refund 50% of [Charge] cooldown.

rare.name: ROCKET BOOTS
rare.description: Holding crouch increases the height of your next jump by up to 200%.

epic.name: INFUSION GENERATOR
epic.description: Increase [Barrier Field] Health by 100% of your max Life.

epic.name: PHOENIX PROTOCOL
epic.description: [Barrier Field] regenerates 50% faster and begins regenerating 50% sooner after being destroyed.

powers.title: AMPLIFICATION BARRIER
powers.description: Friendly projectiles that pass through your [Barrier Field] deal 15% more damage.

powers.title: BARRIER RECONSTRUCTION
powers.description: When you deal damage with [Rocket Hammer] or [Fire Strike], restore health to [Barrier Field] equal to 10% of its max Health.

powers.title: TO ME, MY FRIENDS!
powers.description: While [Barrier Field] is active, allies within 5m are healed equal to 3% of your max Life every 1s.

powers.title: WILHELMWAGEN
powers.description: While [Barrier Field] is deployed, you heal for 15% of the damage it mitigates and gain 30% Move Speed.

powers.title: SHIELD STAMPEDE
powers.description: +50% [Charge] Knockback Power. During [Charge], automatically deploy [Barrier Field].

powers.title: VANGUARD
powers.description: [Charge] grants nearby allies Overhealth equal to 10% of your max Life and 20% Move Speed for 3s.

powers.title: VROOM BOOM BOOM
powers.description: During [Charge], colliding with a wall triggers an explosion that deals 30% of [Charge]'s pin damage.

powers.title: BLAZING BLITZ
powers.description: After using [Earthshatter], every [Rocket Hammer] swing launches a [Fire Strike] for 4s.

powers.title: IMPACT BURST
powers.description: [Fire Strike] triggers an explosion the first time it hits an enemy, dealing 20% of its damage in a 3m radius.

powers.title: MAGMA STRIKE
powers.description: If [Fire Strike] is cast twice within 2s, the second strike leaves a trail of lava that Burns enemies for 50% of [Fire Strike] damage.

powers.title: FEELING THE BURN
powers.description: Every 3rd [Rocket Hammer] swing applies Burn, dealing 30% [Rocket Hammer] damage over 2s.

powers.title: SMASHING!
powers.description: When you deal damage with [Rocket Hammer], gain 5% Move Speed and 4% Weapon Lifesteal for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.
